attributes.action: Stop forced adoption and make it illegal.
attributes.additional_details: There’s 25,000 plus children who are forcibly adopted in the U.K. each year by the secret family courts. These courts are not open to the public unlike criminal courts.  Parents who are party to proceedings are forbidden to talk to anyone about what happens in court. They’re silenced with a gagging order which means if they talk they face 10 years in prison, but it’s time the world knows what is going on in our family courts. Parents have already got the life sentence - isn’t that enough?
attributes.background: Let’s get the Government to listen to the people. We need to stop forced adoption and make it illegal. Only parents should be able to consent to their children being adopted.
